009package Color_Edges;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.pub.color.edge.CannyEdgeDetector;
017
018import java.awt.Point;
019import java.util.List;
020
021
022public class Canny_Edge_Demo_Minimal implements PlugInFilter {
023        
024        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
025                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
026        }
027
028        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
029        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
030        
031                CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters params = new CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters(); 
032                                                        
033                params.gSigma = 3.0f;   // sigma of Gaussian
034                params.hiThr  = 20.0f;  // 20% of max. edge magnitude
035                params.loThr  = 5.0f;   // 5% of max. edge magnitude
036                
037                CannyEdgeDetector detector = new CannyEdgeDetector(ip, params); 
038                
039                FloatProcessor eMag = detector.getEdgeMagnitude();
040                FloatProcessor eOrt = detector.getEdgeOrientation();
041                ByteProcessor eBin = detector.getEdgeBinary();
042                List<List<Point>> edgeTraces = detector.getEdgeTraces();
043                
044                (new ImagePlus("Canny Edges", eBin)).show();
045                
046                // process edge detection results ...
047        }
048}
